protocol.name: P-GSE17875-3
protocol.text: Normal conditions. Mature rosette leaves were harvested at 5, 6 and 7 weeks after sowing.

protocol.name: P-GSE17875-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Trizol reagent.

protocol.name: P-GSE17875-5
protocol.text: cRNA was prepared following the manufacturer's instructions. Labelled cRNA transcripts were purified using the Sample Cleanup Module (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA). Fragmentation of cRNA transcripts was performed according to the manufacturer's GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE17875-6
protocol.text: Hybridization of the high-density oligonucleotide microarrays (Arabidopsis ATH1 genome array; Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA) was performed according to the manufacturer's GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE17875-7
protocol.text: Scanning was performed according to the manufacturer's GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.
